metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8063 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
drivers/media/usb/dvb-usb/cxusb.c in the Linux kernel 4.9.x and 4.10.xbefore 4.10.12 interacts incorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option,which allows local users to cause a denial of service (system crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact by leveraging use of more than onevirtual page for a DMA scatterlist.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8063` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required
